name: myportfolio-main
description: - The design is based on [Bedimcode](https://github.com/bedimcode) - The resume is created on [FlowCV](https://flowcv.com/) - The email service provider is [EmailJs](https://www.emailjs.com/) - Contact form validations are added using [JavaScript](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fz8bwvn9lA4)  - Normal alerts are replaced with Sweet Alert [SweetAlert](https://sweetalert.js.org) - The favicon generator is [favicon.io](https://favicon.io/favicon-generator/) - The Open Graph Meta Tags are added [Open Graph](https://ogp.me/) - Videos are embedded from [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com) - Presentations are  embedded from [Beautiful.ai](https://www.beautiful.ai) - Added Google Tag script for [Google Analytics](https://analytics.google.com) - Online meeting integration by [Calendly](https://calendly.com/)
